abstract: An Ostrowski type integral inequality for the Riemann-Stieltjes Integral R ba f (t) du (t) , where f is assumed to be of bounded variation on [a, b] and u is of r ? H?Hölder type on the same interval, is given. Applications to the approximation problem of the Riemann-Stieltjes integral in terms of Riemann-Stieltjes sums are also pointed out. © 2000 Korean Society for Computational & Applied Mathematics and Korean SIGCAM.
